version_description:
Update Content

- Make some improvement on FA
1. Move FA chat channel to FA interface
2. Now chairman can abdicate his position and appoint a new chairman.
3. Members can spend 20 coins replacing chairman's position if he was offline for more than 7 days.
4. Now you can share your players to FA channel.
- Fixed the bug that in some occasions, friends' fixture won't be loaded correctly.

1.15.1 Update Content
- HALLOWEEN LOGIN BONUS
Log in 5 days during 10.27-11.2, get special award.

- HALLOWEEN PACKS IN SHOP
Add 3 new halloween discount packs in shop, up to 50% discount!

- MYSTERIOUS SURPRISE IN MATCH
We’ve prapared mysterious surprise in matches during Halloween period.

1.15.2 Update Content
- Optimized the red pot reminder of Assistant
- Added new reminder for managers who log in during maintenance, you may check the time period of maintenance in it.
- Fixed some display bugs when switching accounts.

1.15.4 Update Content:
- Add Facebook invitation Function in FA, now you can invite your facebook friend to join your FA
- Fix the display problem while season swtiching
- Fix the display problem when switching accounts
- Fix the wrong explanation in ‘Sponsor’ interface
- Fix some bugs

1.15.9 Update Content:
-Fix the bug that some players in Auctions market can not get back to orginal teams when the countdown is over.
-Fix the wrong message for sponsor in Assistant

1.15.10 Update Content
- Fixed the bug that no matches in Fixture
- Fixed the wrong number when recover energy by watching ads
- Fixed the bug that can not refuse players generated from Youth
Fixed some bugs
Fixed some bugs
- Fix the bug that wrong reward after watching ADS
Fixed some bugs
- Fix some bugs and make the game experience smoother.
- Fix some bugs and make the game experience smoother.
- Optimize login interface and game logo.
- Fix some bugs and make the game experience smoother.
- Extra video ads for energy pack after your own LEAGUE,CUP,CHAMPIONS LEAGUE and UNION CUP games.
- New event "Halloween Bonus"---- every manager can claim many resources during Halloween.
- Fix some bugs and make the game experience smoother.

- Update: add the function of picture frame, achieve an achievement to get the corresponding picture frame like：
DREAM TEAM FRAME
Approach of achieving:The top 3 of each country's Weekly Rank.
- Fix some bugs and make the game experience smoother.

- Add a devil training function.Devil training can improve the abilities of a player in a short period of time.
- Added an icon for the MOD.

- The players in the auction can be canceled under certain conditions.
